Module com.example.organizer
Package com.bookclub.service

Class BookProgressService

java.lang.Object
com.bookclub.service.BookProgressService
public class BookProgressService extends Object
The BookProgressService class is a singleton service responsible for managing book progress for users. It provides methods for retrieving, updating, and deleting progress for books read by users. The class works with two access objects: IBookProgressAO for book progress and IUserAO for user data.

      public BookProgressService()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BookProgressService getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of BookProgressService.
      Returns:
      the BookProgressService instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the service is not initialized.

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(com.bookclub.iao.IBookProgressAO bookProgressAO, com.bookclub.iao.IUserAO userAO)
      Initializes the BookProgressService with the provided data access objects. This method must be called before accessing the singleton instance.
      Parameters:
      bookProgressAO - the IBookProgressAO to manage book progress.
      userAO - the IUserAO to manage user data.

    • getBookProgress

      public Optional<BookProgress> getBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Retrieves the book progress for the given book and user.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book for which progress is to be retrieved.
      user - the User whose progress is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the BookProgress, or empty if not found.

    • hasBookProgress

      public boolean hasBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Checks if there is progress recorded for the given book and user.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book to check.
      user - the User to check.
      Returns:
      true if there is progress recorded, false otherwise.

    • startBookProgress

      public boolean startBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Starts tracking progress for the given book and user if no progress exists.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book for which progress is to be started.
      user - the User who is starting the progress.
      Returns:
      true if progress is successfully started, false if progress already exists.

    • finishBookProgress

      public boolean finishBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Finishes (deletes) the book progress for the given book and user.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book whose progress is to be finished.
      user - the User who is finishing the progress.
      Returns:
      true if the progress is successfully finished, false otherwise.

    • saveBookProgress

      public boolean saveBookProgress(Book book, User user, int chapterNumber)
      Saves or updates the progress of the given book for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book for which progress is being saved.
      user - the User who is saving the progress.
      chapterNumber - the chapter number to save as progress.
      Returns:
      true if progress is successfully saved, false if the chapter number is invalid or save fails.

    • getFormattedProgressForBook

      public List<String> getFormattedProgressForBook(Book book)
      Retrieves a formatted list of user progress for the given book. Each entry contains the username and their current chapter number in the format: "username is at chapter X/Y".
      Parameters:
      book - the Book for which progress is retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of formatted progress strings.

    • getBookProgressListForBook

      public List<BookProgress> getBookProgressListForBook(Book book)
      Retrieves a list of BookProgress for a specific book, sorted by the current chapter number in ascending order.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book to get progress for.
      Returns:
      a sorted list of BookProgress for the specified book.
